version_description:
1. You can send Emoji in chatroom!
2. Optimized Hero Info interface.
3. Optimized Battle Report: The Heroes displayed in battle reports and scout reports are those in the "first row".
4. Optimized Cross-Server Arena: Now you can check Battle History and Server Ranking!
5. Other bug fixing and optimization.

1. Interface optimization: World Treasure event, Hero Star-up, Alliance info.
2. Bug fix: Shared battle reports’ display error.
3. Other bug fixing and optimization.
Other bug fixing and optimization.

1. New Hero is coming!
2. Optimized Reward quest's experience.
3. Optimized city buildings' art asset.
4. Other bug fixing and optimization.

1. New decoration, Golden Mouse, is coming!
2. New feature: Flag. In world map, a flag will be shown next to your castle. You can change your flag in Personal Info interface.
3. Cross-Server Battle Optimization: When you transfer to other server, you will get a 1-minute shield.
4. Other bug fixing and optimization.

1. Increased Super Amass' maximum commander number.
2. Other bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1.Bug修復與性能優化。
1.Bug修復與性能優化。
1.Bug修復與性能優化。
1.Bug修復與性能優化。
1.Bug修復與性能優化。

1.戰鬥表現優化
2.《加入聯盟條件》新增《玩家使用語言》
3.新增群聊功能：玩家可發起好友間的群聊
4.其他bug修復與性能優化。
性能優化及部分問題修復

1.軍團寶藏功能正式開放！完成任務來獲得藏寶圖，根據藏寶圖去尋寶！您可以通過金融中心或功能列表查看此功能。
2.在UTC 20:00新增一次世界BOSS活動。最終結算時間仍是UTC 13:00。
3.在世界地圖偵察資源田、首府等非主城建築時，可查看敵人英雄的屬性。
4.油田建築被摧毀的郵件現可顯示獎勵內容。
5.其他bug修復與性能優化。

1.新增《聯盟邀請》功能：可在聊天界面邀請其他玩家加入我方聯盟；
2.修復建築顏色錯誤的bug；
3.其他bug修復與性能優化。

1.《軍團寶藏》體驗優化：增加獎勵預覽，可查看不同事件的獎勵池；
2.護盾道具體驗優化：使用護盾時增加面板提示，護盾消失時增加郵件提示；
3.其他bug修復與性能優化。
問題修復及性能優化

1.體力面板優化：顯示回復全部體力所需時間；
2.集結面板優化：直觀顯示你是否已加入此集結；
3.其他bug修復與性能優化。
Bug修復與性能優化。

1. Hero interface optimization: Display the methods to obtain items and enhance your heroes.
2. Battle report optimization: Battle reports of warhammer and refugee camp now display the remaining reward chances.
3. Other bug-fixing and optimization.

1. Interface optimization: Optimized Hero interface and quest interface.
2. Other bug-fixing and optimization.
Some bug fixes and performance optimizations

1. Added description in Trap/Potion Craft interface.
2. March interface optimization
3. If you send troops to build a resource facility on world map, they will start gathering automatically when the facility is built.
4. Other bug-fixing and optimization.
Fix the problem that some functions of iOS9 system are abnormal
bug fixes and performance optimizations

1. Pop Star rules have been adjusted: The daily limit of gifts is linked with the VIP levels.
2. Censorship rule in the chat function has been optimized.s
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
New energy optimization level bug fixes
bug fixes and performance optimizations

1. Flexible schedule for Supply Contest Event: The time of the event is decided by your vote!
2. Guide for Upgrade Component: Click the Source button to check methods to obtain Upgrade Components.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Shield Optimization: If none of your current marches break the shield, you may open one. (e.g. You can open a shield if you have 2 gathering marches out of your base.)
2. Alliance Help Optimization: You may cancel your request and resend one.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1.新增6星懸賞任務的種類：訓練士兵、採集資源
2.新增設置開關：大地圖點擊優先級。開關開啟時優先點擊到地圖建築，開關關閉時優先點擊到行軍隊列。
3.優化設置開關：城內快速移動開關現在同時控制建築和士兵。
4.其他bug修復與性能優化。

1. Reward Quest Optimization: If none of your finished quests’ quality is lower than Rare, you will receive the mysterious reward!
2. Interface Optimization: Battle report – Stats Comparison.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Enhancement Factory Upgrade: Enhancement Factory is upgraded to Manufacturing Center. While remaining previous functions, it will have more functions in the future! Stay tuned!
2. Interface optimization according to your feedback!
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. After purchasing the monthly card, you can receive all the daily Gem without watching video clips.
2. Interface optimization according to your feedback!
3. Eternal Land Event is coming! Stay tuned!

p.s. We will adjust the main interface recently, and 3 icons will be removed. The Road of Growth can be accessed via Gift Pack Store. Capital Contest and Cross-Server Battle can be accessed via Event.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Optimized the interface of Tax Center.
2. Increased the attribute bonus of Upgrade Facility and Weakening Facility. (You may build these buildings with Legendary Craftsman Profession)
3. Bug fixing: You can use a shield when your attacking troop is returning to base.
4. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. New hero is coming! Friedman Hertz can fire EMP to enemy Air Units, increase their damage taken and they have a chance of attack failure.
2. You can speedup/cancel troop training in batch.
3. You can close menu bar in world map interface and have a better view.
4. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. Bug Fixing: The defending troops don’t display correctly after you restart the game.
2. Bug Fixing: Cannot use “Speedup All” in troop training interface.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. Easter Gacha Event is coming!
2. Increased the level cap of VIP.
3. Icon Optimization.
4. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Optimization of the Consignment Function.
2. New Reward Quest Added: Attack wild boss and Warhammer.
3. After the player base is destroyed, it will be rebuilt at a random location of the map.
4. Alliance Fortress Optimization.

1. Coming soon: Launch Tower Scramble
2. Alliance Droid panel optimization.
3. The bug that the Tax Center freezes in some states has been fixed.
4. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. New City Map: The landscape in the city is more lively!
2. New Alliance Interface: We Adjusted the layout of functions, the Alliance Help has been moved to the Message button.
3. New Refugee Rescue Interface: More intuitive and convenient, easier to collect rewards.
4. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Scout bug fixed: unable to scout all available enemy units when there are too many units in the city.
2. The Shield breaking time will be shown in the mail.
3. Other bug fixes and optimization.
4. Alliance interface has been optimized again. Alliance Help is now at the top of the list
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. New CP Calculation Formula: Not only units, but also upgrades, skins, heroes, etc. will be calculated. The displayed CP will show the current power more precisely. The buildings within the city are no longer counted.
2. “Launch Tower Scramble" opens every Tuesday instead of Wednesday.

1. Optimization of Upgrade and Weakening Facility:
a. The construction cost, Durability and number of Garrison Troops have been adjusted.
b. Upgrade and Weakening Facilities in unoccupied areas can be attacked during cross-service battle.
2. During the Ba-bump event, the Ba-bump can be quickly searched through the search function.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. New Function: Expedition. After building the Expedition Base, you can gain idle rewards by defeating the BOSS!
2. New Function: Decorations Manufacturing. Materials obtained from the Expedition can be merged into decorations in the manufacturing center.
3. Billboard Optimization: In addition to the date of events, news and other information will be updated from time to time.

1. Class talent progress is added to the main interface to let you know the progress of talent upgrade.
2. Upgrade and Weakening Facility Optimization: The description have been added and the notice of insufficient resources has been optimized.
3. Notification Rule Adjustment: only the notification of the last activated character will be pushed.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. The wild monsters in the world have been optimized
2. The Alliance Territory panel has been optimized
3. The Alliance chat will no longer display Alliance help request.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Game Environment Optimization: New chat rules will be displayed and friend request messages will be censored.
2. The landscape in the city has been optimized.
3. Players can no longer request technology chest in the Alliance Help function.
4. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. The time of Launch Tower Scramble has been changed to UTC 1 PM, Tuesday. It lasts for 2 hours. Please refer to the rules on the event page for the specific time.
2. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. The time of Launch Tower Scramble has been changed to UTC 1 PM, Tuesday. It lasts for 2 hours. Please refer to the rules on the event page for the specific time.
2. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. Alliance Defense will open on May 28th for all servers.
2. ATK bonus against wild boss has been optimized. It will take effect on World Boss, Defense events, Warhammer, Ba-bump and Alliance Droid.
3. Other bug fixes and optimization.

1. New content in Legion Store: new SR hero Kate Curry shards.
2. Other bug fixes and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. The landscape in the city has been optimized.
2. The animation of the CP increase has been optimized.
3. New VIP privilege: When reaching a certain VIP level, you can claim rewards directly without watching any video.
4. Other bug fixes and optimization.
1.Bug修復與性能優化。

1. New Island Battle, more challenges waiting for you.
2. The rules of the Cross-server Battle have been optimized.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1.Bug修復與性能優化。

Update Announcement
1. New Function: hero recommendation.
2. June castle skin is online.
3. The hero bonus panel has been optimized.
4. The rules for cross-server battle have been adapted: during the preparation stage, you cannot attack the opponents in the frontline fortress.
5. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

Update Announcement
1. Amass and Reinforce will be added to Cross-server battle.
2. Warhammer amass notice icon will be added to the city.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. The Auto join button of Warhammer amass attack has been optimized.
2. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. The look of the Marching queue has been optimized.
2. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. The rewards of the Boss Arrival event, Cross-server battle, and Capital Contest have been adjusted.
2. Other bug fixes and optimization.

Update Announcement
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization .

Update Announcement
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
2. The background music of Capital Contest has been changed.
3. A quick change feature of upgrade components has been added.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. New hero coming soon: Gira activates a damage reduction shield for our land force after the battle starts. Each time the enemy launches a normal attack on our troops, it will increase 1 point of rage. When the rage reaches 7 points, our land force will release an extra powerful single attack during the next round.
2. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. The maximum level of Alliance technology is increased.
2. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

New update
1.Lunching the Troops equipment system
2.bug fixing and performance optimization

The Newest you will see
1. Optimized the attributes of the Capital Leader
2. The opening level of the expedition is LV.28
3.The decoration materials will not be dropped during the expedition, instead, decorations will be dropped directly
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Added a new feature to the server world map, now you can get all the info with a click
2. Fixing and adjusting some bugs

Update Announcement
1. Equipment‘s attribute has been upgraded.
2. Item Warehouse has been deleted.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Other bug fixes and optimizations.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
1. New navy-type Hero: Bessel is at your service!
2. Optimized the sound effect and the music for Cross-server Battle and Eternal Land.

Patch Notes
1. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

Patch Notes
1. Corrected the effective time of Super Magnetic Field and Corrosive Mucus.
2. Adjusted and balanced the cost for Super Magnetic Field and Corrosive Mucus.
3. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. You can attack/defense a Buff/Nerf facility under construction. If there's no army stationed in the facility under construction, the building will be removed soon.
2. On the World Map, the owner of a Buff/Nerf facility cannot activate shield for the facility, and if you build or station in the facility, the shield would be disabled.
3. New feature: Decor Set Index. Please see more details on Decor Chest screen.
4. New feature: Treasure system. View the treasure index from Gallery to see the treasure over the world. Unlock the treasures to activate stat bonuses.
5. The access to Decors is moved to Store - Decor Chest.
6. Optimization: added page turning feature.
7. Other bug fixes and optimizations.

1. Adjustments: Adjusted the levels required to unlock the following features:

Reward Quest: Lvl. 20
Refugee Camp: Lvl. 21
Expedition: Lvl. 22
Island Battle: Lvl. 42
Class Potential: Lvl. 45

2. Bug fixes: Minor bug fixes.

1. New Perk: a new perk for the Great Scientist - Electro Missile. This Perk allows the Great Scientists to develop Missiles in the Manufacturing Center. The Electro Missiles are used to attack the Buff/Nerf Facilities and disable those facilities for some period of time.
2. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. In the "Battle Stage" of the Cross-server Ranking, the target of the Strengthening/Weakening Facility is changed from "all Alliance members" to "all commanders on the same server".
2. At the beginning of the "Prep. Stage", commanders will not be forced to move their bases if they are located in the four grids in the Capital Center, and members are allowed to move into these grids as well.
3. The Commander level required for unlocking fast merge (merge multiple units at the same level) feature is changed to Lv. 30.

1. New feature: Battle Log is added to the Capital Building. Commanders may view the details of the battles.
2. Minor bug fixes and improvements

1. UI change: on the Tech research screen, "Current Level" will be displayed instead of "Next Level".

1. Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
1.Purchasing packs with Rough Crystal will no longer gain you Energy Cubes.
2.Minor bug fixes and improvements.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes:
1. New permission added for R4 members: R4 members may upgrade Alliance Tech.
2. New feature: Cross-warzone Exercise (SVS Exercise) is coming soon
3. Adjustments on Hero Exclusive Skills (ongoing plan)
4. Minor bug fixes and improvements
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes

New Feature:

Dimensional Mine. Commanders may build a Dimensional Mine and explore the mine for rewards.

Optimization:
1. Optimized the drop rate tab for time-limited recruitment event.
2. Optimized the layout of 7-day Login Reward.
3. Lowered the requirements for creating an alliance.
4. Optimized the guidance of battles for unlocking new areas.
5. Optimized Warhammer Rally panel: you may recall your troops when arriving the target location.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes:

Features & Events:

1. Get ready for Halloween events!
2. The Custom Rewards (Weekly) is available for all servers
3. Bradley and Ganso: - There will be additional bonus when the exclusive skill reaches Lv. 3/5/7;
Ganso - increase the Gathering Speed; Bradley - increase the "Army damage increase".
4. Adjustments to the Gallery: this feature is temporarily unavailable for improvements. Commanders may keep the treasures they've unlocked
5. Minor bug fixes and performance improvement

Patch Notes

1. New feature added: now commanders may attack the Dark Forces 5 times in a row.
2. Rush Mode available for Island Battle. Now this feature will be available for some servers, will soon be available for all servers.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

1. Optimized the order of items in inventory
2. Improved the exclusive skill of Tian Mu
3. Hero attributes increase extra attributes for troops
4. Bug fixes and improvements"
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

New Features
1. [New] Hero bond: collect heroes and discover stories between them to activate special attributes. (Available at some servers first)
2. [New] Craft in batch: as we promised on Facebook and Discord, batch craft is added to the craft center.

Optimization and Bug Fixes
1. [Optimization] added EXP required for the next level when tapping on the EXP bar.
2. [Optimization] optimized the main game view. Adjusted the default zoom ratio in the base and on the world map.

OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES

1. [Optimization] Optimized the "Recruit" notification in hero panel
2. [Optimization] When there is not enough food/oil for upgrading/researching Perk/Unit Suppression, you'll be able to purchase food/oil at the VIP store price (if applicable)
3. [Optimization] Adjusted the confirmation in Perk panel
4. [Optimization] Dimensional Mine: display the alliance tag of the current mine holder
5. [Optimization] Modified the rules of the Military Exercise (SVS)
6. [Bug Fixed] In the Inventory - Enhance, tap "use" will direct you to the right building
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

EVENTS
- [NEW] Thanksgiving Decor Set

OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- Optimized description for Gem Points event
- Optimized guidance for unlocking grids
- Added the Alliance tag in the Military Exercise
- Removed the Transport button
- Now you can chat with candidates before accepting their requests to join the Alliance.

FEATURES
- [NEW] Now you can select emotes to show on your base(Available at some servers first)

OPTIMIZATION AND BUG FIXES
- Rules
Optimized condition for creating an alliance
- UI & Display
a) Adjusted the display of units in battle panel
b) Revised the Predecessor requirement message in Tech Center

OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- Rules
Optimized the rules of Military Exercise (SVS). You may use your units and if you win a higher-ranked rival, you will take your rival's place and your rival will drop to your place.
- UI & Display
Added full star-level special effects on the hero panel

Patch Notes
- UI & Display
a) Added a warning message to indicate the emoji is locked
b) Changed the base on fire effect
- Bug fixes
Adjusted the height for Island Battle result panel

Patch Notes
[New] Christmas Gift Contest
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- Features
Added more info/details for Base skin skill

Patch Notes
FEATURES
[NEW] Exclusive pack for VIP9~VIP12, please refer to the VIP tab for more details
- UI & Display
Optimized the display for hero skill buff

Patch Notes
FEATURES
[NEW] VOICE-OVER for the most of the heroes - added voice-over for heroes: tap on them in the Hero List and pre-battle panel to "make them speak"
EVENTS
- Burn Them All: Hey! who burnt my Cedar?

Patch Notes
- UI & Display
1. Added icons for Navy, Army and Air Force in the Hero List
2. Optimized the purchase point event panel
- Bug fixes
1. Added event display in Calendar in newer servers
2. Fixed the visual bug in the Base buff list
1. Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
Dear commanders:
We will perform a scheduled maintenance. Please find the update detail as follows:
FEATURES
[New] Added new techs to the Alliance Tech -
1) Ally discount: reduce the price of items sold in Alliance Store
2) The most wanted: increase the tickets gained from reward requests
[New] Odinium is added to the Legion Store
[New] You'll be able to use the unit you acquired instantly
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- Features
Added a limit to the Treasure Guards you could kill per day - 20 times. You'll not be able to gain ranking rewards after defeated 20 guards

Patch Notes
Dear commanders:
We will perform a scheduled maintenance. Please find the update detail as follows:
FEATURES
[New] Added new techs to the Alliance Tech -
1) The New Era of Glory - unlocks new Alliance badges
2) Territorial Expansion - expands the coverage of the Alliance Fortress
[New] You'll be able to disable the voice-over
[New] You'll be able to use the unit you acquired instantly
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- UI & Display
The max number of items you can use in the inventory is 10K

Patch Notes
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- Features
1) Optimized the reconnection process
2) You can type more words in the title and content of the Alliance mail
- UI & Display
1) Optimized UI for Deep Sea Hunting
2) Optimized the graphics of Clock Tower
- Bug fixes
1) Fixed the Engineer glitch in tutorial

Patch Notes
[NEW] Server transfer feature is released in SOME servers.
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- UI & Display
1) Optimized the Alliance help panel, again
2) The base skin skill effect will no longer overlap the transform button
- Bug fixes
Fixed the visual bug of the Phantom Ship chest shows in the wrong position
"War of Odinium" Optimization
1) The reward will be decided based on the battle result and the individual points
2) If the system couldn't find you an opponent, it will send the compensation to your mailbox
3) Newer servers (released within 30 days) may not be able to join in this event
4) Added the Canyon Store
5) Added an Individual Ranking for members in both Alliances

Patch Notes
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- Features
1) When all the main quests are completed, tapping the “!” next to the quests will direct you to the Reward Quests
2) You'll be able to see the reason why you are muted in the world chat
- UI & Display
Red dots are added to the calendar to highlight new events

Patch Notes
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
1) Now you can see the material you have in Arsenal when producing material
2) Optimized the voice over for troops on marching
- Bug fixes
Fixed the visual bug of the discount in Treasure Store

Patch Notes
- Features
1) Added guaranteed item rewards to Hero Return, Mysterious Treasure and Lucky Fortune
2) The Eternal Land Optimization
- Bug fixes
1) Now the requirements set by the server leader will not be reset after server maintenance
2) Fixed the visual bug in server transfer list

Patch Notes
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations.

Patch Notes
- Features
1) Optimized the red dot on the Calendar so that after you read it, it will not show again.
2) Now you can select 1 Hall of Valhalla unit to repair instead of all of them

Patch Notes
- UI & Display
a) Optimized the battle report panel
b) Optimized the description of Wade's skill, he could only apply fast-repair regular units

Patch Notes
[NEW] Beast Throb event - challenge the legendary beast shaped Throb made by the Dark Legion!
Optimized the start time for events - most of the events will show the actual start date and time
You'll be able to see the HP of your Ally's base
Fixed the overlap in the battle report
1.Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
- UI & Display
Optimized the Warzone Exercise panel
- Bug fixes
Fixed the visual bug when viewing commander's alliance in World chat

Patch Notes
FEATURES
[NEW] Server Transfer is released in more servers: now players on S1~700 may go to the Capital - Manage Transfer to see the list that you could transfer to.
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
1. Base skin description - Added image description to give more details about these two bases: Out of Blue, Pretty in Pink
2. Optimized the repair factory for Hall of Valhalla units
- Bug fixes
1. Fixed the "Attribute" button in the battle report
2. Now the HP of Kraken K-3 is showing properly in battle

Patch Notes
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
1. Added drop rate for some items in the inventory
2. Drop rate added for the "Orange Ammo Box"
3. Increased the speed of the congrats animation
- Bug fixes
1. Fixed the visual bug on Warhammer panel
2. New chat system: now you can chat with players even if you are not friends

Patch Notes
- UI & Display
Optimized the display logic for Base Skin, Queue Skin and Decor Choice Chest
- Bug fixes
Fixed the bug when placing the Hall of Valhalla units in battle, hero damage will be reduced
1.Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
- Features
1. Now you can see how many times you have detected in the Dimensional Mine
2. When you are trying to join a rally, you'll be able to get a message if there's not enough time for you to march towards it
1.Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
- Features
[NEW] Gira and Rockfield are added to the Premium Recruit, Elite Recruit and the Island Battle store. And now you can also get their exclusive skills from the "Skill Acquire" Panel
- Bug fixes
1. When defending, the Crit of Kraken K-3 and Arvak A-160 will apply properly
2. Fixed the visual bug when the warhammer is defeated before the unit reaches the destination

Patch Notes
OPTIMIZATION & BUG FIXES
1) Optimized the Rally panel
2) Optimized the animation for heroes (idle)
3) Optimized the Red and Blue Tile-matching panel
4) Optimized the layout for Ruin detail panel
1.Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
1) Added bonus details to the Decor attribute panel
2) New Seasonal Sales event: Spring Sales - Buy the Spring Seasonal Sales packs to get Flower Vouchers and redeem for rewards!
3) Added battle reports to Expedition Base
1.Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
1) Optimized the location of notification banner in the War of Odinium
2) In the gathering report, you'll see the level of each resource tile
4) When an Alliance gives up the ownership of a ruin, members of this Alliance will not be able to attack/compete for this ruin in a certain period of time.
6) The general reset time for all Ruin functions is 16:00 (GMT) every day

Patch Notes
Optimized the performance of Hero Skill Panel
Optimized the message panel for "Not enough Gems"
Added a double-confirmation when purchasing valuable items (Class Re-select Ticket, Specialized Class Re-select Ticket, etc.)
Minor bug fixes and optimizations.

Patch Notes
[NEW] The Element Tower will be released on all servers
Added a double confirmation when upgrading Heroes with Universal Orange Shards
War Of Odinium related -
1. When a commander leaves the WoO battlefield, there will be a cooldown time before this commander could enter the battlefield again.
2. Commanders located in the spawn area (start area) can only attack the facilities in the battlefiled, and they cannot attack other commanders in this battlefield.
3. When a participant leaves the Alliance, the leader of the Alliance can remove this commander from the list of the participants.
Fixed 914's skill - Ignite

Patch Notes
Optimized the performance of the Special Effect Research Center
Formation -
Added a message to inform you when there is a formation that can be upgraded
Formation 101 - the description panel will direct you to the store to get it
Optimized the performance of the chat system

Patch Notes
[NEW] Added new SVS rules to the main screen, you can access to the introduction panel from your base, but please note this game mode is under test right now, and the rules announced there are subject to change.
[NEW] Easter Special Operations
[NEW] Easter Egg Vendstar Event
*This feature/event will be available for servers older than 31 days
Added a confirmation panel when you are trying to reset the progress of the Island Battle
1.Bug fixing and optimization.

Patch Notes
